Hi everybody, 

First thank you for all your work. I didn´t try it because it doesn´t  work on Windows but it seems to be a very good project.

As mentioned in the title, in the file CameraLensPrivate.hh, line 73, the compiler complains that value is undefined. It is indeed undefined and I couldn´t find anywhere aka in other files a declaration. 
I´m trying to compile it with VisualStuio 2013 (v12) 

Thx in advance for your help,
content.html:
Hi everybody,

First thank you for all your work. I didn´t try it because it doesn´t work on Windows but it seems to be a very good project.

As mentioned in the title, in the file CameraLensPrivate.hh, line 73, the compiler complains that value is undefined. It is indeed undefined and I couldn´t find anywhere aka in other files a declaration. I´m trying to compile it with VisualStuio 2013 (v12)

Thx in advance for your help,
